articles.title: SpaceX plans to launch a record 52 rockets in 2022 — and it's already on track to hit that goal - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: A former NASA astronaut warned SpaceX and the agency to be careful not to become victims of their own success.
articles.content:
SpaceX is striving to launch a total of 52 missions this year, meaning that, on average, it would send one rocket into space every week.
